PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-02982020-05-01JUS,  PS,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCriminal Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Prescribing Certain Firearms and Other Weapons, Components and Parts of Weapons, Accessories, Cartridge Magazines, Ammunition and Projectiles as Prohibited, Restricted or Non-Restricted
PrecisRegulations amending the REGULATIONS PRESCRIBING CERTAIN FIREARMS AND OTHER WEAPONS, COMPONENTS AND PARTS OF WEAPONS, ACCESSORIES, CARTRIDGE MAGAZINES, AMMUNITION AND PROJECTILES AS PROHIBITED, RESTRICTED OR NON-RESTRICTED in order to (1) limit the access to firearms that are characterised by their design and capability of inflicting significant harm to Canadians; (2) reduce the number and availability of assault-style firearms and any other firearms that exceed safe civilian use in Canada; and (3) reduce the possibility of these firearms being diverted to the illicit market.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0096 Publication Date: 2020-05-13
AttachmentsAttachment
